member.name: D3D12_BOX.left
member.summary: The x position of the left hand side of the box.

member.name: D3D12_BOX.top
member.summary: The y position of the top of the box.

member.name: D3D12_BOX.front
member.summary: The z position of the front of the box.

member.name: D3D12_BOX.right
member.summary: The x position of the right hand side of the box, plus 1. This means that right - left equals the width of the box.

member.name: D3D12_BOX.bottom
member.summary: The y position of the bottom of the box, plus 1. This means that bottom - top equals the height of the box.

member.name: D3D12_BOX.back
member.summary: The z position of the back of the box, plus 1. This means that back - front equals the depth of the box.
